extendedInfo.description: Notice:  This app has recently been upgraded.  Returning users may need to reinstall.Welcome to the Wilkes-Barre Times Leader Garage Sales application, your trusted source for finding local garage sales.Hunting down and mapping out routes for garage sales can be time consuming and frustrating:  either outdated information, or no local listings.  But with the Garage Sales application from the Wilkes-Barre Times Leader you can save time by searching current, local ads on the go.  Itâs the easiest and most reliable way to find garage sales near you.Search and Save by keywords, open days and times, and proximity to your location.  View detailed information, even pictures.   Set up alerts to be notified when new garage sales featuring your preferences come up.  Map out your shopping strategy so you can be first to get the good deals.  Make a weekend of treasure hunting in your area, with the Garage Sales application from the Wilkes-Barre Times Leader in hand!Keywords: garage sale, yard sale, rummage sale, tag sale, estate sale, map, mapping, classified, local sale, craigslist, newspaper, shopping, free, finder, craigs list, garagesaleapps, treasure map, flea market,, Wilkes-Barre Times Leader, Thetimesleader.com, Luzerne County, NEPA

reviews.title: No sales!
reviews.comment: This app hasn\'t shown any garage sales in weeks! Fix it please, then I\'ll re-in stall and give it a better rating. Used to be great.
reviews.author: Carole Ceonzo

reviews.title: No listings
reviews.comment: Why hasn\'t this app shown any listings in the last few months? It used to work perfectly.
reviews.author: Joie Mattioli

reviews.title: All that is awesome
reviews.comment: Only thing i wish it had some sort of GPS with your location and a way to only see today\'s sales
reviews.author: jesse wade

reviews.title: Pain to use
reviews.comment: I must uninstall and re install every week to get only new listings. It keeps all the old ones for some reason. Frequently sends me to the wrong stree
reviews.author: A Google User
